actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 95-185.
Placed on Calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H. R. 5493 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorizations for appropriations for the San Francisco Bay and Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuges, and the Tinicum National Environmental Center.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 95-185) Extends the authorization for appropriations for the San Francisco Bay National Wildlife Refuge, California, from June 30, 1977 through September 30, 1980. Authorizes the appropriation of $25,500,000 for the Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge, North Carolina, for a period ending September 30, 1980. Authorizes the appropriation of $11,100,000 for the Tinicum National Environmental Center, Pennsylvania, for a period ending September 30, 1980. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified additional acreage for the Tinicum National Environmental Center.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorizations for appropriations for the San Francisco Bay and Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuges, and the Tinicum National Environmental Center.
